subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Justin Verlander remained winless in four starts since his return from the disabled list, allowing seven runs on Sunday as his E.R.A. ballooned to 6.75 during the Tigers’ 10-5 loss to the Blue Jays.
snippet: Justin Verlander remained winless in four starts since his return from the disabled list, allowing seven runs on Sunday as his E.R.A. ballooned to 6.75 during the Tigers’ 10-5 loss to the Blue Jays.
